containers.description: A set of configuration blocks that describe the settings of the containers that will be launched on the container service. Maximum of 53. Detailed below.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the deployment was created.

publicEndpoint.description: A configuration block that describes the settings of the public endpoint for the container service. Detailed below.

serviceName.description: The name for the container service.

state.description: The current state of the container service.

version.description: The version number of the deployment.
